title: Ghanaian striker Ernest Asante extends hot scoring form in Norway
text:
13:40 CET Ghanaian striker Ernest Asante extends hot scoring form in Norway 
Ghanaian attacker Ernest Asante has taken his seasonâ€™s scoring tally to ten goals after hitting the target in the Norwegian top-flight on Saturday. 
The 26-year-old scored in the second-half for Stabaek in their 4-1 home defeat to giants Aalesund
